message.furtotemsmod.mode_description.PL: Places a new totem in the world.
message.furtotemsmod.mode_description.RE: Removes a totem from the world.
message.furtotemsmod.mode_description.AD: Adds a player to the totem's protection.
message.furtotemsmod.mode_description.RE: Removes a player from the totem's protection.
message.furtotemsmod.mode_description.AD: Adds a player to totem's blacklist.
message.furtotemsmod.mode_description.RE: Removes a player from totem's blacklist.
message.furtotemsmod.add_member: Player has been added to the totem list
message.furtotemsmod.add_to_blacklist: Player has been added to the blacklist.
message.furtotemsmod.no_active_totem: You don't have an active totem nearby.
message.furtotemsmod.remove_member: Player has been removed from the totem list
message.furtotemsmod.block_protected_by_: This block is protected by a totem!
message.furtotemsmod.entity_protected_by: This entity is protected by a totem!
message.furtotemsmod.player_protected_by: This player is protected by a totem!
message.furtotemsmod.item_protected_by_t: This item is protected by a totem!
message.furtotemsmod.totem_overlaps_anot: This totem overlaps with another player's zone.
message.furtotemsmod.too_many_small_tote: You have reached the limit of Minor Totems!
message.furtotemsmod.too_many_large_tote: You have reached the limit of Major Totems!
message.furtotemsmod.level_already_appli: This level has already been applied or is higher!
message.furtotemsmod.item_granted: Thanks for great idea for the mod, and constant paying for it. Take this plushie uwu
message.furtotemsmod.nearby_spawner: You cannot place Totem near spawners!
message.furtotemsmod.reached_large_totem: You've reached the maximum amount of Major Totems.
message.furtotemsmod.staff_does_not_matc: The staff does not match any material!
message.furtotemsmod.missing_required_bl: You are missing the required item/block in inventory:
message.furtotemsmod.no_totem_to_remove: There isn't a totem to remove here.
message.furtotemsmod.not_owner_of_totem: You're not the owner of this Totem!
message.furtotemsmod.player_already_memb: Player is already on the list!
message.furtotemsmod.player_not_member: Player is not on the list!
message.furtotemsmod.player_already_in_b: That Player is already banned from your Totem's Protection.
message.furtotemsmod.player_not_in_black: That Player is not in your blacklist!
message.furtotemsmod.more_light_level: It's too dark here; you need skylight to place a totem here.
message.furtotemsmod.enter_protection: You are entering the protection of
message.furtotemsmod.leave_protection: You are leaving the protection of
